input.sentences: the bride and groom exchange vows .
they have a very vintage car to ride in .
the bride and groom smile for pictures .
output.sentences: The couple is changing vows and their parents, relatives overjoyed.
The groom spent a lot of time fix this vintage car, now the ride would be impressive.
They said final goodbye and ready to get inside of the car, diving away for their honeymoon.
The girl who caught the bouquet was asking her boyfriend how much longer she had to wait.
The little boy is taking a picture of his favorite girl whom he fell in love at the first sight.
